1b1('bum): n+ya rgyashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ dadam bu bcu bzhi/
1b2('bum): pa/ bam po dang po'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
1b3('bum): dben pa'o// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'du
1b4('bum): shes dben pa'i bar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir
2a1('bum): / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
2a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mig dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnab dben pa'i
2a3('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sna dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
2a4('bum): lce dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lus dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
2a5('bum): dben pa'o// yid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// gzugs dben pa'i phyir she rab kyi
2b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sgra dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dri dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ro dben pa'i phyir shes
2b2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// reg dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// chos dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// /
2b3('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
2b4('bum): snga'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
2b5('bum): lus kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol
2b6('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir
2b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
3a1('bum): lce'i 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi ba
3a2('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor pa
3a3('bum): dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rna ba'i 'das te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
3a4('bum): dben pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor
3a5('bum): ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
3a6('bum): pa dben pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes
3a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// chu'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// me'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
3b1('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rlung gi khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// nam mkha'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
3b2('bum): phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams dben pa'i phyir shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ma rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes pha rol tu phyin pa
3b3('bum): dben pa'o// 'du byed dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
3b4('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ming dang gzugs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// skye mched drug dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol
3b5('bum): tu phyin pa dben pa'o// reg pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// tshor ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sred
3b6('bum): pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// len pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// srid pa dben pa'i phyir shes
3b7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin dben pa'o// skye ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rga shi dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
4a1('bum): dben pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i
4a2('bum): phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol/
4a3('bum): phyin pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// bsams gtan gyi tu phyin pa dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// shes rab kyi
4a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab
4a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi
4a6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha
4a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab
4b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// thog ma tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
4b2('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa
4b3('bum): nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyib tu phyin pa dben pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rang gi mtshan
4b4('bum): nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o//
4b5('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// /
4b6('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dben pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
4b7('bum): pa dben pa'o// yang dag par spong ba dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
5a1('bum): dben pa'o// dbang po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// stobs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
5a2('bum): pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag dben pa'i ba'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha/
5a3('bum): rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// bsam gtan dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
5a4('bum): pa'o/ tshad med pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
5a5('bum): pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu
5a6('bum): phyin pa dben pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mngon
5a7('bum): par shes pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben po'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams dben pa'i phyin shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo
5b1('bum): dben pa'i phyir shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// mi 'jigs pa dben
5b2('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// byams pa chen po dben pa'i
5b3('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// snying rje chen po dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa dben pa'i
5b4('bum): phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o/ phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
5b5('bum): pa dben pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben
5b6('bum): pa'o// rang byang chub dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// /
5b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben pa'o// lha'i bu dag gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
5b8('bum): rgyun tu zhug pI 'bras bu dben pa'i
6a1('bum): thams cad dben par bshad pa la sems mi 'dzum yongs su 'dzum par mi 'gyur la/ de'i yid 'jigs par mi 'gyur na/ byang chub sem
6a2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
6a3('bum): rab 'byor ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ba yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos thams
6a4('bum): cad ma mchis pa'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad dben
6a5('bum): pa dang zhi ba dang / ma skyes pa'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das
6a6('bum): de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la zhum par mi 'gyur ro// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum
6a7('bum): bar 'gyur ba dang / gang gis zhum par bya dang / gang la zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/ dmigs su ma mchis so// bcom
6b1('bum): ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de skad du bshad pa la mi zhum mi 'gong zhing tshi chad dang sgyid lug par mi 'gyur la/ mi 'jigs/ mi sdang skrag/
6b2('bum): par mi 'gyur na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lags so// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar gang zhum par 'gyur ba 'am/ gang gis
6b3('bum): zhum par 'gyur ba'i chos de dag thams cad ni ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dbang po dang bcas pa/
6b4('bum): tshangs pa dang bcas/ skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kyis phyag bgyi bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sem
6b5('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ skye rgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
6b6('bum): kyis phyag bya bar zad kyi/ gang 'phags pa mngon par 'phags pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa'i/ dge rgyas dang / 'bras bu che ba dang / gnas gtsang ma'i rig kyi lha rnams
6b7('bum): kyis kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen de la phyag bya bar 'gyur ro// rab 'byor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi
7a1('bum): bya/ khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas grangs med chad med pa/ gang ji snyed bzhugs shing
7a2('bum): 'tsho skyong ba de dag kyang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag la dgongs pa mdzad de/ byang chub sems dpa'
7a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
7a4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed
7a5('bum): pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
7a6('bum): par byed pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid yongs su
7a7('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'dus ma byas
7b1('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su
7b2('bum): rdzogs par byed pa'o// dor med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod
7b3('bum): su rdzogs par bya'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// dngos po med pa'i stong pa
7b4('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// /
7b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs
7b6('bum): par byed pa'o// dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs pa
7b7('bum): byed pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// bsam gtan
8a1('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yong
8a2('bum): su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnams yongs su rdzogs par
8a3('bum): byed pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
8a4('bum): par byed pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// gzugs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
8a5('bum): bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// byams
8a6('bum): ba chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// snying rje chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed
8a7('bum): pa'o// rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
8b1('bum): bu yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rang byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa
8b2('bum): shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'o// zhes dgongs pa mdzad do// rab 'byor byang chub
8b3('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems
8b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni sangs rgyas su gyur par rig par bya'o// rab 'byor gang gi'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ 'jig rten gyi khams dag na/ sems can gang
8b5('bum): ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdud sdig to can du gyur te/ bdud sdig to can de dag re res kyang de snyed kyi bdud kyi sde dngon par sprul kyang / de dag thams
8b6('bum): cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la bar chad bya bar mi nus so// rab 'byor chos gnyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
8b7('bum): dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ des chos thams cad stong pa nyid do zhes bya bar rnam par bltas pa yin//
9a1('bum): des sems can thams cad kyang yongs su ma btang ba yin te/ rab 'byor chos 'di gnyis dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
9a2('bum): dpa' chen po ni bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no// rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
9a3('bum): dpa' chen po chos gnyis dang ldan pa ni/ bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin te/ gnyis gang zhe na/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin du byed pa yin te/ sangs
9a4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis dgongs pa yin te/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos
9a5('bum): de gnyis dang ldan pa ni/ bdud sdig to can rnams kyis mi thub pa yin no// rab 'byor de ltar ni spod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
9a6('bum): drung na/ lha'i bu rnams kyang 'ong bar sems so// bsnyen bkur ba dang / yongs su dri ba dang / kun 'dri ba byed par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod sangs rgyas
9a7('bum): kyi byang chub thob par 'gyur gyis de bas na rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa dang / mtshan ma med pas rnam par spyod pa
9b1('bum): dang / smon pa med pas rnam par spyod pa de nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa de gyis shig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis rnam par spyod pa des rnam par
9b2('bum): spyod pa dang / sems can 'gon med pa rnams kyi 'gon du 'gyur ro// sems can skyabs med pa rnams kyi skyabs su 'gyur ro// sems can dpung gnyen
9b3('bum): med pa rnams kyi dpung gnyen du 'gyur ro// sems can gnas med pa rnams kyi gnas su 'gyur ro// sems can rten med pa rnams kyi rten du 'gyur ro// sems can gling
9b4('bum): med pa rnams kyi gling du 'gyur ro// sems can mun par gyur pa rnams kyi snang bar gyur ro// zhes de la spro ba skyed par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar
9b5('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med/ grangs med pa dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig dge slong gyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor te bzhugs shing/
9b6('bum): 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'di lta ste/ shes rab
9b7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yon tan de dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de'i ming dang / rigs yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
10a1('bum): cing ched du brjod pa ched brjod mdzad de/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nga da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen
10a2('bum): dpal gyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gtsug phud kyi ming yongs su brjod pa'i chul
10a3('bum): gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa ched du brjod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i zhabs 'bring
10a4('bum): na/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag gi ming yongs su brjod pa'i tshul gyis ston cing / ched du brjod pa ched du brjod
10a5('bum): ba bzhin no// shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems
10a6('bum): dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod
10a7('bum): ba yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho bskyong ba dang / chos ston cing de dag kyang
10b1('bum): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar de dag pa spro bar
10b2('bum): mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing
10b3('bum): 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
10b4('bum): ba dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
10b5('bum): 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho bskyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i
10b6('bum): spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa
10b7('bum): mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho bskyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na
11a1('bum): bya/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral
11a2('bum): pa de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan
11a3('bum): 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po// gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa
11a4('bum): spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang brjod pa mdzad do// lho nub
11a5('bum): kyi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
11a6('bum): dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/
11a7('bum): ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs 'tshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa
11b1('bum): de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar de dag la spro
11b2('bum): bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod bu ched du brjod pa mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho ba
11b3('bum): dang / chos ston pa de dag kyang de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig/ tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral
11b4('bum): ba de dag pa spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed
11b5('bum): cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang chos ston pa'i de dag kyang / de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ji snyed cig tshangs pa'i spyad pa spyod cing / shes
11b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral ba de dag la spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa ched du brjod mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sem
11b7('bum): dpa' chen sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob kyi bar du byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba gang ci snyed cig yod pa de dag pa yang /
12a1('bum): bya bya/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston te/ ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// de ci'i
12a2('bum): phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi tshul rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don tu zhugs pa de dag ni dka' ba byed pa'o// gsol baM/
12a3('bum): bcom ldan 'das/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po slar ldog pa 'am/ slar mi ldog pa 'am/ gang gi ming yongs su
12a4('bum): brjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa mdzad/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phyir mi ldog pa
12a5('bum): las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yang yod/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung ma bstan pa las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
12a6('bum): pa yang yod de/ de dag la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro ba mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do//
12a7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de dag gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang
12b1('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i rjes su slob
12b2('bum): pa'i tshul gyis rnam par spyod pa de dag la/ sangs bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa
12b3('bum): mdzad do// rab 'byor gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen dpal gyi rjes su slob pa'i tshul gyis byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa de
12b4('bum): dag la yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad do// rab 'byor
12b5('bum): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / chos thams cad skye ba med par mos kyang mi skye ba'i chos
12b6('bum): la bzod pa thob pa/ chos thams cad stong pa zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad zhi ba'o zhes bya ba dang / chos thams cad gsog gso ba ste rag lus pa'o zhes
12b7('bum): bya ba dang / snying po med pa'o zhes bya bar mos kyang / mi skye ba'i chos lnga bzod pa ma thob pa de dag la yang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag spro bar mdzad pa'i
13a1('bum): / tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod mdzad do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la sangs
13a2('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su rjod pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
13a3('bum): po de dag gis ni/ nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa spangs pa yin te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa yin no//
13a4('bum): rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang la/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ming yongs su brjod
13a5('bum): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing / ched du brjod pa yang ched du brjod pa mdzad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par
13a6('bum): 'gyur te/ de la gnas pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
13a7('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo bshad pa thos na/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ji ltar bshad pa de
13b1('bum): bzhin no// zhes nem nur med cing the tsom mi za la rmongs par mi 'gyur na/ des ni phyis kyang rgya cher de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/
13b2('bum): rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de dag las thos par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu de
13b3('bum): yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la mos shing / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji skad du bstan pa de bzhin du mos pas/ phyir
13b4('bum): mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thos pa ni/ phan pa mang
13b5('bum): por gyur pa yin te/ gang gis mos shing mos nas de bzhin nyid du gnas pa dang / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni smos kyang mi smos te/ de dag de
13b6('bum): bzhin nyid la gnas pa/ de bzhin nyid la nan tan byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
13b7('bum): bzhin du gnas nas/ de bzhin nyid du nan tan du bgyis te/ chos gang yang mi dmigs na de ji ltar na/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba/
14a1('bum): @lags/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin nyid las ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi dmigs na/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas hA
14a2('bum): 'gyur/ su zhig de bzhin nyid la gnas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ su shig de bzhin nyid
14a3('bum): la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su ma mchis na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla
14a4('bum): na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs 'chang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/
14a5('bum): de ni gnas ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gang 'di khyod kyis 'di skad du gang 'di de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / de bzhin la
14a6('bum): gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i chos gang ya de bzhin nyid las
14a7('bum): ma gtogs par gzhan dmigs su med de/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te
14a8('bum): pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
14b1('bum): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/
14b2('bum): ni gnas med do zhes zer ba ni/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smras pa de bzhin no// rab 'byor gang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa dang / gang
14b3('bum): de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / gang de bzhin nyid la gnas shing chos ston
14b4('bum): par 'gyur ba de lta bu chos gang yang de bzhin nyid la ma gtogs par/ gzhan dmigs su med de/ de bzhin nyid kyang dmigs su med na/ gang de bzhin nyid la
14b5('bum): gnas par 'gyur ba dang / de bzhin nyid la gnas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dang / de bzhin
14b6('bum): nyid la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te de ni gnas med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung /
14b7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa rnams ma byung yang rung ste/ chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid dang / ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang / chos
15a1('bum): nyid ni gnas pa'o// chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings dang / chos kyi gnas nyid dang / chos skyon med pa nyid dang / yang dag
15a2('bum): pa'i mtha' de ni gnas pa ste/ rab 'byor de bzhin nyid la ni gang yang gnas par 'gyur ba med de/ de la gnas shing / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
15a3('bum): chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur su yang med na/ de la gnas shing chos ston par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do// de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin
15a4('bum): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni zab ste/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems
15a5('bum): dpa' chen po gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag ni dka' ba bgyid pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
15a6('bum): ldan 'das chos gang yang dmigs su ma mchis te/ su yang de bzhin nyid la gnas pa ma mchis la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
15a7('bum): par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang ma mchis ste/ chos ston pa yang gang yang ma mchis la/ des kyang zham par yang mi 'gyur zhing / de dag la nem nur du 'gyur ba
15b1('bum): 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba ma mchis pa ni bka' ba bgyid pa'o// de nas gnas gtan rab 'byor gyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so// ke'u k+ka gang
15b2('bum): khyod kyis 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang chos zab mo 'di dag la nem nur du mi 'gyur/ rmongs par mi 'gyur ba ni
15b3('bum): bka' ba bgyid pa'o// zhes gsol pa ni/ ke'u shi ka chos thams cad stong pa nyid yin na de la nem nur du 'gyur ba 'am/ rmongs par 'gyur ba lta su zhig yod/
15b4('bum): brgya byin gyis smras pa/ gnas gtan rab 'byor ni gang ci ston kyang de thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing smon te/ ci la yang chags pa med do// 'di lta ste/
15b5('bum): dper na bar snang la 'phangs pa'i mda' ni ci la yang chags pa med do// de bzhin nyid du gnas brtan rab 'byor kyis chos bstan pa yang ci la yang chags pa med
15b6('bum): do// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ le'u lnga bcu pa'o// / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis btso
15b7('bum): ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ci ljags/ bdag gis de skad du gsol te/ de skad du brjod pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs
16a1('bum): @pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su brjod cing chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid yang dag par lung bstan par 'gyur ba lags sam/ bcom
16a2('bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gang khyod kyis de skad du smras te/ de skad du brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rjes su brjod pa dang / chos su
16a3('bum): brjod pa chos kyi gnyer ba'i chos nyid lung ston par 'gyur ro// brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ gnas gtan rab 'byor 'dis ci dang ci spobs pa de
16a4('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ mtshan ma ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ smon pa ma mchis pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid
16a5('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin
16a6('bum): pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ phyi stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/
16a7('bum): nang stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ chen po stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ don dam pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing
16a8('bum): sa matan gyi rgyu byin pa zhidi rgya mami shing thongs/
16b1('bum): spobs/ 'das byas stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid brnams shing spobs/ mthar las 'das pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ thogs
16b2('bum): dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ chos thams cad stong pa
16b3('bum): nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid brtsam
16b4('bum): shing spobs/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bcas shing spobs pa dang / dran pa nye rab gzhag pa rnams brtsams
16b5('bum): shing spo bas/ yang dag par spong ba rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ dbang po rnams brtsams shing spobs/ stobs
16b6('bum): rnams brtsams shing spobs/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams brtsams shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa brtsams shing spobs/ 'phags pa'i bden
16b7('bum): ba rnams brtsams shing spobs/ bsam gtan rnams brtsams shing spobs/ tshad med pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
17a1('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ rnam par thar pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/
17a2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa brtsams shing spobs/ mngon par shes pa rnams brtsams shing smon spobs/ mngon
17a3('bum): par shes pa rnams brtsams shang spabs/ ting nge 'dzin rnams brtsams shing spongs/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams brtsams shing spobs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
17a4('bum): brtsams shing spobs/ mi 'jigs pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ snying rje chen po btsams shing spobs/
17a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams brtsams shing spobs/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing
17a6('bum): spobs/ phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu brtsams shing spobs/ dgra bcom pa nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rang byang chub brtsams shing spobs/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa
17a7('bum): nyid brtsams shing spobs/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brtsams shing spobs pa ngo mtshar che'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ke'u shi ka gnas
17b1('bum): gtan rab 'byor stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ tshul
17b2('bum): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
17b3('bum): na/ gang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
17b4('bum): pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
17b5('bum): pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa lta ci smos/ nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang nang stong pa nyid la bsgom pa lta
17b6('bum): smos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyi stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyi nang stong pa nyid la sgom
17b7('bum): pa lta ci smos/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ chen po stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang chen po stong
18a1('bum): pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci spos/ don dam pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang don dam pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus/
18a2('bum): byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang 'dus byas stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa lta ci smos/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
18a3('bum): la gang sgoms pa lta ci smos/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ thog ma dang tha ma med
18a4('bum): pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dor ba med pa stong
18a5('bum): pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rang bzhin stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs
18a6('bum): na/ gang chos thams cad stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta smos/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/
18a7('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dngos
18b1('bum): po med pa stong pa yid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ nga za ga stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang ngo ba nyid stong pa nyid la gang sgom pa lta ci smos/ dngos po med pa'i ngob
18b2('bum): nyid stong pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la sgom pa lta ci smos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang dran
18b3('bum): pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang yang dag par spong ba rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/
18b4('bum): 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ dbang po rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gad dbang po rnams la sgom pa lta
18b5('bum): smos/ stobs rnams mi dmigs na/ gang stobs rnams la sgom lta ci smos/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bang chab kyi yan lag rnams kyang
18b6('bum): ma dmigs na/ gang byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la sgoms pa lta ci smos/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yang mi dmigs na/ gang 'phags pa'i lam yan
18b7('bum): lag brgyad pa la sgom pa lta ci smos/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyang mi dmigs/ gang 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ bsam gtan
19a1('bum): rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang bsam gtan rnams sgom pa lta ci smos/ tshad med pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang tshad med pa
19a2('bum): rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci
19a3('bum): smos/ rnam par thar rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rnam par thar pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang mi
19a4('bum): dmigs na/ gang mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med
19a5('bum): pa yang mi dmigs na/ gang rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la sgom pa lta ci smos/ mngon par shes pa kyang mi
19a6('bum): dmigs na/ gang mngon par shes pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ ting nge 'dzin rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang ting nge 'dzin rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos//
19a7('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gzungs kyi sgo rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang
19b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la sbom pa lta ci smos/ mi 'jigs pa rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang mi 'jigs pa rnams la sgoms pa lta ci smos/
19b2('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yang mi dmigs na/ gang so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la sgom pa lta ci smos/ snying rje chen po nyid kyang mi dmigs na//
19b3('bum): gang snying rje chen po sgom pa lta ci smos/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco rgyad kyang mi dmigs na/ gang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon
19b4('bum): par bsgrub pa lta ci smos/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ lan
19b5('bum): cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
19b6('bum): bu nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang mi migs na/ gang dgra bcom pa nyid
19b7('bum): rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ rang byang chub nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang rang byang chub kyi 'bras bu rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ lam gyi rnam pa shes
20a1('bum): pa nyid kyang ma dmigs pa gang las kyi rnas bshes pa nyid rjes su thob pa ga sa smos/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang
20a2('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa lta ci smos/ de bzhin nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ gang de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang mi
20a3('bum): dmigs na/ gang ma skyes pa mngon par 'du byed pa lta ci smos/ mtshan rnams kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gi lus la mtshan yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ dpe byad rnams
20a4('bum): kyang mi dmigs na/ gang gi lus la dpe byad yod par 'gyur ba lta ci smos/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka gnas brtan rab 'byor ni chos thams cad dben pa la rnam par
20a5('bum): spyod pa ste/ dmigs su med pa la rnam par spyod pa/ stong pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa la rnam par spyod pa/ smon pa med pa la rnam par spyod pa ste/
20a6('bum): ke'u shi ka gnas gtan rab 'byor gyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa des ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
20a7('bum): rnam par spyod pa la brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// stong kyi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba'i char yang nye hA
20b1('bum): mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba brgya phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// bye ba khrag khrig brgya
20b2('bum): phrag stong gi char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o// grangs dang / cha dang bgrang ba dang / dpe dang / rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par
20b3('bum): spyod pa ma gtogs par byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / nyan thos rnams kyi rnam
20b4('bum): par spyod pa gang yin pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par spyod pa gang yin pa'i rnam par spyod pa de dag las/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
20b5('bum): tu phyin pa la rnams par spyod pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid ni/ mchog ces bya'o// rab ces bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na
20b6('bum): med pa gong na med pa mnyam pa med pa/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// ke'u shi ka de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can thams
20b7('bum): cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar 'dod pas/ 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnam par spyod pa 'di nyid kyis rnam par spyod par bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ke'u shi ka shes
21a1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das ste/
21a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// sangs
21a3('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ro// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
21a4('bum): kyi ye shes rjes su thob nas/ bag chags 'tshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
21a5('bum): rgyas su 'gyur ro// / bam po gnyis pa'o//
21a6('bum): de nas 'khor de nas sum bcu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams me tog ma d+ha ra ba mang po thogs te/ bcom ldan 'das pa gtor to// mngon par gtor to// rab tu ga
21a7('bum): to// dge slong brgya phrag drug cu tsam yang stan las langs nas/ chos gos 'phrag pa cig tu bzar te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom
21b1('bum): ldan 'das gang na ba de logs su thal mo sbyar bas btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mig mi 'dzums par lta zhing phyag 'tshal lo// dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te
21b2('bum): btud pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus snyim pa me tog ma d+ha ra bas gang bar gyur nas/ me tog ma d+ha ra ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
21b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gtor to// mngon par rtor to// rab tu gtor to// de ltar 'thor zhing mngon par 'thor ba dang / rab tu 'thor ba'i tshe tshig 'di skad brjod do//
21b4('bum): bcom ldan 'das dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul ma lags pa'i rnam par spyod pa dam pas/ bdag cag rnam par spyod
21b5('bum): bar gyur cig ces smras pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag gis bsam pa thugs su chud de de'i tshe 'dzum pa mdzad do// sangs rgyas bcom
21b6('bum): ldan 'das rnams kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de ste/ de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas/ 'di lta ste 'od zer sngon po dang / ser po dang /
21b7('bum): dmar po dang / dkar po dang / leb rgan dang / shel dang / rdul gyi kha dog lta bu rnam pa sna tshogs byung ste/ de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
22a1('bum): @khams snang bas rgyas par bkang nas byir 'dus te/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du g.yas phyogs su bskor ba dus te/ bcom
22a2('bum): dan 'das kyi dbu'i drug d+hAsgrub bo// dgas che dang ldan pa kun dga' ba stan las langs nas/ bla gos 'jug pa gcags byas kyi/ pus mo g.yas pa'i
22a3('bum): ngas la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pas gtud te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
22a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni/ rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ ci'i rgyu ci'i rkyen gyis 'dzum
22a5('bum): ba mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo dge slong brgya phrag drugacu po 'di/
22a6('bum): dag bskal pa dpe skar ma lta bu la/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ste/ me tog sil ma zhes bya ba'i de
22a7('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo me tog sil me zhes bya ba'i de bzhin
22b1('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun mtshungs par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtshungs par 'gyur/ tshe'i
22b2('bum): chad ni 'di lta ste lo stong du mtshungs par 'gyur te/ de dag gang dang gang nas/ mngon par 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / mngon par byung nas rab tu byung ba dang / rab
22b3('bum): byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba de dang de dag tu/ me tog rnam pa lnga dang ldan pa'i me tog gi char mngon par
22b4('bum): 'bab par 'gyur ro// dga' bo de bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa dam pas rnam par spyod par 'dod pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu
22b5('bum): phyin pa la spyod par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa'i rnam par spyod par 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
22b6('bum): phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la spyod pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo des
22b7('bum): 'di ltar bdag ni mi'i nus shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes pa ste/ mi'i nang du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo
23a1('bum): 'di rgya cher thos pa 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di ni rgya cher thos pa'o zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par
23a2('bum): bya'o// dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di dag la spyod pa de dag/ de bzhin gshegs pas rnam par
23a3('bum): gzigs par blta ste/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la nyan pa dang / thos nas 'dzin pa dang / 'chang
23a4('bum): ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gang zag byang chub sems pa'i theg pa rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gas
23a5('bum): mo 'di rjes su ston cing rjes su 'dems shing / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa des/ bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
23a6('bum): sangs rgyas rnams las/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di thos par 'gyur ro// bzung ba dang / bcangs pa dang / bklags pa dang / kun chub par byas par
23a7('bum): gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag la yang dge ba'i rtsa ba mang po bskyed par gyur to// zhes bya bar rtogs
23b1('bum): par rig par bya ste/ dga'o rigs kyi bu 'am rigs bu mo des/ bdag gis nyan thos rnams la dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed/ nyan thos rnams las shes rab kyi pha rol tu
23b2('bum): phyin pa zab mo 'di thos pa ma yin no// zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o// dga'o rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab
23b3('bum): mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / chos dang / yi ge dang mthun par khong du chud par byed na/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am
23b4('bum): rigs kyi bu mo des bdag la ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mngon tu gyur to zhes bya bar rtogs par rig par bya'o//
23b5('bum): dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa thos na/ phyir mi bzlog cing ngan tu mi brjod la/ thos nas kyang
23b6('bum): mos pa thob par gyur na/ dga'o rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo de ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis
23b7('bum): yongs su bzung bar rig par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
24a1('bum): sangs rgyas rnams las/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lta yang mi slu ste/ nyan thos sam rang sangs rgyas sam/ sangs rgyas su
24a2('bum): 'gyur mod kyi 'on kyang / dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu bla la spyod pa
24a3('bum): dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi
24a4('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
24a5('bum): chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha'
24a6('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
24a7('bum): la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos
24b1('bum): bo med pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang
24b2('bum): dag par spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phral gyi rkang pa rnams la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi
24b3('bum): yan lag rnams spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa
24b4('bum): dang / chad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas
24b5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnam
24b6('bum): la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /
24b7('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras
25a1('bum): bu la spyod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa
25a2('bum): dang / rang byang chub la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pas shin tu rtogs par bya'o// shin tu rtogs pa'i byang
25a3('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang /
25a4('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol spyod pa dang / nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang /
25a5('bum): stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid la
25a6('bum): spyod pa dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma
25a7('bum): med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang
25b1('bum): gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dngos po
25b2('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams la spong ba rnams la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa na/
25b3('bum): la spyod pa dang / dbang po rnams la spyod pa dang / stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la
25b4('bum): spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan rnams la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
25b5('bum): pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa rnams la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid
25b6('bum): dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang /
25b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa rnams la spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po rnams la spyod pa dang /
26a1('bum): @#/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / thams cad shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa
26a2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas su mi 'gyur ro// dga' bo de bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di khyod la gtad do// dga' bo
26a3('bum): gal te khyod kyis/ ngas chos gang ji snyed cig bshad pa las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma gtogs par/ ngas chos bstan pa de dag thams cad bzung ste/ kun chub par byas
26a4('bum): nas/ de'i 'og tu chud bsan te/ bor yang de tsam gyis dga' bo khyod la ngas skyon du mi rtsi'i/ dga' bo gal te khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/ kun
26a5('bum): chub par byas nas/ de'i 'og tu chud bsan tam bor bar gyur na/ des ni dga' bo khyod la ngas skyon tu bzung ngo // dga' bo de bas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
26a6('bum): zab mo 'di khyod la gtad kyis ci nas kyang / gzung nas/ bcang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byas pa dang / shin tu yid la bzung bar gyis shig/ legs par
26a7('bum): yongs su zin pa dang / legs par kun chub pa dang / legs par bcangs par gyis shig/ yi ge dang / tshig dang 'bru shin tu rdzogs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig
26b1('bum): legs par shin tu zin par bya'o// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ la rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang /
26b2('bum): kun chub par byed pa des ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub bzung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am rigs
26b3('bum): kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa des ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub yongs su
26b4('bum): bzung bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo mngon tu gyur pa gang da la me rtog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang /
26b5('bum): ba dan gyis rim gror bya ba dang / bkur bstir bya ba dang / phu dud du bya ba dang / mchod par bya bar 'dod pas/ des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung
26b6('bum): bar bya/ bcang bar bya/ klag par bya/ kun chub par bya/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bzung ste/ bcangs nas bklags shing kun chub par byas te/
26b7('bum): tog dang / phreng ba dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan gyis rim gror bya'o// bkur bstir bya// mchod par bya'o//
27a1('bum): mkhyen pa dang
27a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rim gro dang / bkur bsti dang / phu dud dang / mchod par byas na/ des ni nga yang mchod par 'gyur/ 'das pa
27a3('bum): dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di bstan pa la rim gror
27a4('bum): bya/ dga' ba dang / mos pa bskyed pa des ni 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la rim gro dang / dga' ba dang /
27a5('bum): mos pa bskyed par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te khyod la sdug cing yid du 'ong la yongs su ma gtang zhe na/ dga' bo khyod kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sdug pa dang / yid du
27a6('bum): 'ong ba dang / yongs su mi btang bar gyis shig/ ci nas kyang shes rab kyi tu phyin pa/ zab mo 'di las tshig 'ga' tsam yang khyod kyis chud ma zos par gyis shig/ dga'
27a7('bum): bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di btad pa las brtsams te/ khyod la mang du bstan pa yang mdor na dga' bo khyod la nga ji ltar ston par gyur pa de bzhin
27a8('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yang khyod kyi ston pa yin gyis/ dga' bo de bas na ngas khyod la tshad med par gtang bas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di yongs
27b1('bum): su btang te/ dga' bo de lta bas na rtsa dang / mi dang / lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi mdun du brjod de/ sus sangs rgyas yongs su ma btang ba dang / chos yongs
27b2('bum): su ma tang ba dang / dge 'dun yongs su ma btang dang / 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yongs su ma btang ba dang /
27b3('bum): 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub yongs su ma btang ba des/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di yongs su mi btang
27b4('bum): bar bya ste/ 'di ni nga'i gdams ngag go/ dga' bo rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
27b5('bum): pa dang / 'phel bar byed pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa dang / gzhan la yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di rnam grangs du
27b6('bum): mar rgya cher 'chad pa dang / ston pa dang / rab tu ston pa dang / shes par byed pa dang / rab tu gzhog pa dang / 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'grel pa dang / gsal bar
27b7('bum): byed pa dang / yang dag par ston pa'i rigs kyi bu dang / rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba ste/ rnam
29a1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na byang shar gyi phyogs 'tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khaMs tshad med grangs med//
29a2('bum): dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhags shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sang
29a3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dag 'od ltar byung ba'i
29a4('bum): dus na shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
29a5('bum): pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
29a6('bum): chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams tshad med/
29a7('bum): dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i
29b1('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung
29b2('bum): ba'i dus na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med/ dpag tu med dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
29b3('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
29b4('bum): byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung na 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med/ dpag tu med pa
29b5('bum): dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhags shing 'tshe skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom
29b6('bum): ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo da ltar byung ba'i dus na
29b7('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
30a1('bum): @sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang / chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi bla na med pa yang dag
30a2('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las byung ngo // dga' bo de bas na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
30a3('bum): 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la bslab par 'dod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo 'di la bslab par
30a4('bum): bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo de 'di lta ste shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ma ste bskyed par byed pa'o// dga' bo byang
30a5('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang pha rol tu phyin pa drag la slob pa de dag thams cad ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dga' bo de bas na
30a6('bum): khyod pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag yang dang yang du yongs su btad do// rjes su btad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
30a7('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod de/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi mdzod ni/ zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi mdzod do// dga' bo phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
30b1('bum): gyi khams tshad med grangs med/ dpag tu med pa dag na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang /
30b2('bum): chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drag gi mdzod 'di las ston to// dga' bo 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa bcom pa yang dag
30b3('bum): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang pha rol tu phyin pa drag po 'di dag la bslabs nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
30b4('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos bstan to// dga' bo ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig
30b5('bum): byung ba de dag kyang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag la bslabs te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/
30b6('bum): chos kyang ston par 'gyur ro// dga' bo 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi nyan thos gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang
30b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las bslabs te/ yongs su mya ngan las 'das par gyur to// yongs su mya ngan las 'da'o// yongs su mya ngan las bda' bar 'gyuraro//
31a1('bum): theg papa rnams la nyan thos kyi
31a2('bum): dga' bogs te khyod kyis gang theg nyan thos kyi sa yis bsgoms te/ chos bstan pa'i chos bstan des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen
31a3('bum): de'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa nyid mngon tu byed par gyur kyang da dang nyan thos kyis nga'i nyan thos kyi bya ba byas par
31a4('bum): mi 'gyur gyi/ dga' bo gal te khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i tshig 'ga' zhig brjod de bstan pas/
31a5('bum): nyan thos khyod kyis dges par byas pa yin te/ nyan thos kyis nyan thos kyis bya ba byas par 'gyur ro// dga' bo de ji snyam du sems/ chos bstan pa snga ma des stong
31a6('bum): gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par dgra bcom pa nyid du mngon tu byed par gyur na/ dgra bcom pa
31a7('bum): de dag gi sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams kyi dngos po dang / tshul khrims las byung ba dang / bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po de dag mang
31a8('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mang ngo // bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo de bas gang zag nyan thos kyi theg
31b1('bum): ba gang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la chung ngu na/ nyi ma gcig cig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du
31b2('bum): 'phel bar 'gyur ro// dga' bo nyin gcig lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te nyi ma phyed dam/ dga' bo nyi ma phyed lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te snga dro gcig gam/ dga' bo
31b3('bum): snga dro gcig lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te chu tshod cig tsam 'am/ dga' bo chu tshod cig tsam lta zhog gi/ dga' bo gal te skad 'ga'/ yud 'ga'/ zang 'ga' zhig/
31b4('bum): gang zag nyan thos kyi theg pa pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan na/ dga' bo de'i bsod nams
31b5('bum): ni ches mang du 'phel bar 'gyur te/ nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yang des zil
31b6('bum): kyis gnon par 'gyur ro// dga' bo gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa rnams la chung ngu na nyi ma gcig gam/
31b7('bum): nyi ma phyed dam/ snga dro gcig gam/ chu tshod gcig tsam 'am/ skad 'ga'/ yud 'ga'/ zang 'ga' zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos ston na/ dga'
32a1('bum): @po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo bas
32a2('bum): cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad zil gyis gnon par gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni bdag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
32a3('bum): rdzogs par 'chang rgya bar 'dod la/ gzhan yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skal zhing / yang dag par dga' bar byed pa yin/ yang
32a4('bum): dag par spro bar byed pa yin/ yang dag par gzhog par byed pa yin/ yang dag par 'god pa yin te/ dga' bo byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de
32a5('bum): ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drag la spyod pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi la spyod pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la spyod pa
32a6('bum): dang / dbang po lnga la spyod pa dang / stobs lnga la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la spyod pa dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la spyod pa dang / 'phags
32a7('bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa dang / tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang /
32b1('bum): rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
32b2('bum): med pa la spyod pa dang / mngon par shes pa rnams la spyod pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams la spyod pa dang / gzungs kyi sgo rnams la spyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stong
32b3('bum): bcu la spyod pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi pa spyod pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / snying rje chen po la spyod pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos
32b4('bum): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa dang / rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la spyod pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
32b5('bum): la spyod pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rang byang chub la sprod pa dang / lam gyi rnams pa shes pa nyid la spyod pa dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
32b6('bum): nyid la spyod pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mang pos rnam par 'phel ba ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yongs su nyam pa'i gnas med skabs med
32b7('bum): de/ de ni gnas ma yin no// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bshad pa'i tshe/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi dang / lha dang mi dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang /
33a1('bum): dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po de ltar 'khod pa rnams kyi mdun du rdzu 'phrul mngon par
33a2('bum): 'du mdzad pa gang mngon par 'du mdzad pas/ thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa 'khor rgya mtsho
33a3('bum): lta bu 'khrugs pa med pa kun kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa/ sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam
33a4('bum): par grol ba/ cang shes pa glang po chen po// bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rjes su thob pa/ srid par sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bka'
33a5('bum): yang dag pas sems shin tu rnams par grol ba/ sems can thams cad la dbang dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa sha stag gi dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang
33a6('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing mdun du bdar ba mthong bar gyur pa de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa mngon par
33a7('bum): 'dra mdzad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de/ phyir brdul bar gyur te/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa de phyir brtul bar gyur nas/
33b1('bum): 'khor bzhi po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yang ma mthong ngo // gang zag nyan thos sam/
33b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag kyang ma mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de'i zhing yang ma mthong ngo // sangs
33b3('bum): rgyas la sogs pa'i dge slong gi dge 'dun yang mig lam na mi snang bar gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
33b4('bum): rgyas kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad pa'i phyir brtul ba mdzad pas/ de'i phyir de dag gis mi mthong bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan
33b5('bum): pa dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo khyod kyis de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang / de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
33b6('bum): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang / dge slong gi dge 'dun dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun mthong ngam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi
33b7('bum): ning de yang ma mthong / de bzhin gshegs pa de yang ma mthong / dge slong gi dge 'dun de yang ma mthong / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun de yang ma mthong ste/ mig
34a1('bum): lam na yang mi grada'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo de bzhin du chos thams cad kyang mig lam du snang ba ma yin te/
34a2('bum): chos snang bar mi 'gyur/ chos kyis chos mi mthong chos kyis chos mi shes so// dga' bo ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya
34a3('bum): mi 'khrugs pa dang / nyan thos de dag dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa de dag dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag mig lam du snang bar ma gyur pa de bzhin du
34a4('bum): chos thams cad kyang mig lam du snang ba yin te/ chos la chos snang bar mi 'gyur/ chos kyis chos mi mthong / chos kyis chos mi shes so// dga' bo ji ltar de
34a5('bum): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang nyan thos de dag dang / gang zag byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa dang /
34a6('bum): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de mig lam na snang bar ma gyur pa de bzhin du/ chos thams cad kyang mig lam du snang ba ma yin no// chos la chos snang bar mi 'gyur ro//
34a7('bum): chos kyis chos mi mthong / chos kyis chos mi shes so// dga' bo chos thams cad ni shes pa med pa/ mthong ba med pa byed pa med pa/ bya ba med pa/
34b1('bum): bya ba la mthu med pa sha stag ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo chos thams cad ni nam mkha' ltar byed pa med pas/ byed pa med cing 'dzin pa med pa'o// dgar
34b2('bum): bo chos thams cad ni sgyu ma'i skyes bu lta bu ste/ bsam mi khyab pa'o// dga' bo chos thams cad ni sems dang bral zhing / rnam par bsgrubs pas/ so
34b3('bum): sor gnas pa'i mtshan nyid de snying po med pa'i phyir tshor ba po med pa'o// de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
34b4('bum): la spyod pa ste/ chos gang la yang mngon par chags pa med do// dga' bo de ltar slong ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ste/
34b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya bar 'dod pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o// de
34b6('bum): ltar slob pa ni rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o// gong
34b7('bum): na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang / mnyam pa zhes bya'o// 'jig rten thams cad la phan pa dang / 'jig rten thams cad la
35a1('bum): bde ba/ mgon med pa rnams la mgon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas kyis gnang ba sangs rgyas kyis bsngags pa/ de la gnas shing de bzhin
35a2('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams stong sum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di phyag g.yas pas gyen du bteg cing phyir
35a3('bum): gzhog kyang / sems can de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di bdeg pa 'am gzhag go zhes bya bar mi sems so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dag
35a4('bum): bo 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de nyid las bslabs pas/ chos rnams la
35a5('bum): thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i ye shes gzigs pas sgrub pa yin te/ dga' bo bslab pa gang ji snyed cig yod pa'i bslab pa thams cad kyi nang na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
35a6('bum): byin pa la bslab pa ni rab ces bya'o// gtso bo zhes bya'o// mchog ces bya'o// dam pa zhes bya'o// phul zhes bya'o// gya nom pa zhes bya'o// bla na med pa zhes bya'o//
35a7('bum): gong na med pa zhes bya'o// mnyam pa med pa zhes bya'o// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya'o// dga' bo gang zhes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa'i chad bzung ba 'am/ mtha'
35b1('bum): btsal bar 'dod pa ni nam mkha' la tshad bzung bar 'dod pa dang / mtha' btsal bar 'dod du zad do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dga' bo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni chad med pa ste/ dga'
35b2('bum): bo ngas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad du bstan pa med pa'o// ming mang po dang / tshig mang po dang / 'bru mang po la ni chad yod kyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ni tshad
35b3('bum): med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad ma mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bo mi zad
35b4('bum): pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad med do// dga' bo dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la tshad med do// dga' bo 'das pa'i dus kyi de bzhin
35b5('bum): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang ji snyed cig byung ba de dag kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid las byung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol
